newbieEmails.subject: Monthly IT Security Update
newbieEmails.body:
Dear Employee,
Please review the latest security policies attached. It's important to ensure your systems are in line with the company's updated security standards.

newbieEmails.subject: Urgent: Password Reset Required
newbieEmails.body:
We've detected suspicious activity on your account. Please reset your password immediately to protect your data: http://secure-login.com/reset
Failure to do so may lead to further security risks.

newbieEmails.subject: New Company Benefits Program
newbieEmails.body:
We have updated our benefits package. Click here to see the full list of changes: http://company.com/benefits
You can also review the updated terms of our healthcare plan and retirement options.

newbieEmails.subject: Action Required: Software Update
newbieEmails.body: A new software update has been released for your system. Please update your software as soon as possible to avoid compatibility issues and enhance security features.

newbieEmails.subject: Tax Filing Deadline Approaching
newbieEmails.body: The tax filing deadline is fast approaching. Please visit our tax filing system to submit your information and avoid late fees. Click here to file: http://company.com/tax-filing

newbieEmails.subject: Unauthorized Access Attempt Alert
newbieEmails.body: Our security team detected an unauthorized login attempt on your account from a new device. If this was not you, please reset your password immediately.

newbieEmails.subject: New Employee Onboarding Documents
newbieEmails.body: Welcome to the team! Please review the following onboarding documents to get started with your new role. You can find the documents here: http://company.com/onboarding

newbieEmails.subject: Security Patch Installation Reminder
newbieEmails.body: Reminder: A critical security patch has been released for your system. Please install it by the end of the week to ensure your system remains protected.

newbieEmails.subject: Congratulations: You've Won a Prize!
newbieEmails.body: Congratulations! You have won a special prize in our company raffle. Please click the link to claim your prize: http://company.com/claim-prize

newbieEmails.subject: Account Verification Required
newbieEmails.body: Your account requires verification before it can be activated. Please verify your details by clicking the link below: http://company.com/verify-account

cybersecEmails.subject: CONFIDENTIAL: Salary Increase Proposal
cybersecEmails.body:
We are considering a salary increase for you. Please confirm your bank details here: http://secure-finance.com/update
This information is confidential, please do not share.

cybersecEmails.subject: New Security Policy Rollout
cybersecEmails.body:
Our security policies have been updated for the upcoming quarter. Please review the changes and acknowledge receipt by following the link: http://company.com/security-policy
Failure to do so may result in non-compliance penalties.

cybersecEmails.subject: Critical System Vulnerability Alert
cybersecEmails.body: A critical vulnerability has been detected in your system. Please download and install the latest patch immediately to mitigate any potential risks. The patch can be found here: http://company.com/patch

cybersecEmails.subject: Request for Security Audit Access
cybersecEmails.body:
We are conducting a routine security audit. Please grant access to the requested logs and systems to assist with the audit. Your cooperation is appreciated.
The request form can be found here: http://company.com/security-audit

cybersecEmails.subject: CONFIDENTIAL: Cybersecurity Breach Notification
cybersecEmails.body: We have been alerted to a cybersecurity breach involving one of our critical systems. Please investigate and report back immediately. A full report can be found here: http://company.com/breach-report
